comments.text:
0) new profile in latest Minefield
1) close the "thanks for using the pre-release" tab
2) close Firefox
3) open Firefox again using the same profile
4) you'll get the about:home page and below the search field will be the new "Restore Previous Session" icon and text
5) click it and it will open another about:home window, which was the previous session

This is quite useless and potentially confusing. When about:home is all that was in the previous session it shouldn't offer to restore it here or from the history menu.
